articles.title: Mohamed Salah's penalty rescues Liverpool from Fulham defeat - The Guardian
articles.description: Striker scored from the spot in the 79th minute to earn a point in a 1-1 draw at Craven Cottage
articles.content: Jürgen Klopp had warned that Fulham would be no pushovers. They are a good-looking football team ... like their manager, said the Liverpool manager. But Scott Parkers side could consider themselves u… [+4529 chars]
